byline.original: By STEPHEN CASTLE and DOREEN CARVAJAL

lead_paragraph: After a four-year legal battle for control of Claridge's and its two sister landmark hotels in London, two British billionaires have sold their shares to the Constellation Hotels Group of Qatar.

headline.print_headline: Battle for Claridge's Ends in Sale to Qatari Group
headline.main: Battle for Claridge's Ends in Sale to Qatari Group

snippet: After a four-year legal battle for control of Claridge's and its two sister landmark hotels in London, two British billionaires have sold their shares to the Constellation Hotels Group of Qatar.
